Question
========

One simultaneously tosses three pure coins. What is the probability that at least one with cross comes up?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.667
* 0.75
* 0.875

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.667: Incorrect
* 0.75: Incorrect
* 0.875: Correct
